name: Rapunzel's Trial
description:
Link to the fixed version if you want to play it without bugs

https://paraxodonstudios.itch.io/rapunzels-trial-fix

RAPUNZEL'S TRIAL

This game is a 2d platformer where you are Rapunzel in a lonely night when she recieves a message from a tinder match telling her to meet up... But then her mom activates security so she can't get to him...

submission to the "Tu Juego a Juicio Jam 2021"

Will you be able to evade every trap in order to not get bald?

  • 3 different finals with it's own shitty cutscene
  • 1 easter egg
  • timer so you can try to beat yourself

- BUG FOUND -
When you play and try to play again sometimes it doesn't work and you have to reset the game, but don't worry, the times you had are saved.
